relation: fairly well lit at night, emergency contacts available... some buildings are unlocked and empty at night. kind of scary when you're walking alone!
there are quite a few clubs and activities constantly involving students. makes time in between classes fun and exciting!
i don't eat at the school, but i've heard the food is decent.
could be better, though i have found it depends solely on the professor. i have been pleasantly surprised in several cases.
don't be afraid to take classes that will challenge you!
a good starter school to get the basics out of the way, psc is a great alternative to a four year school.

textAfterTable: Jeannie from Lakeland, FL 11/04/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 2 of 98 Categories Comments Great for these types of students This school is great for any type of student. From the ones that did horrible in high school from the ones that did great in high school. Bang for the buck If you are a Florida resident you will save a lot of money. Financial Aid is great, so please sign up for it on the first of every January. It will help you save from money. Trust me. Am enjoying being here I like the school and all. but everybody is doing something. I don't really have friends. I am pretty much by myself, but then again I am not a bubbly person that just go up to people. Other than that PSC is a enjoyable place. Am learning a lot I
